installCommand: php -r "copy('https://getcomposer.org/installer', 'composer-setup.php');" && php composer-setup.php --install-dir=/usr/local/bin --filename=composer && php -r "unlink('composer-setup.php');" && composer install --no-dev
buildCommand: php artisan optimize:clear && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache
